name: Stranded Oyen
description:
An entry for BGDJam 2022 with the theme of "choose a path"

A small turn-based game about an orange cat that got stranded on a remote island.

Fight the island's inhabitants, eat fish, survive, find the boat, and get back home.

Controls:

d-pad: move & battle

z: confirm

x: guide & cancel quit

esc: quit to title

How to run the game:

1. Download .zip file

2. unzip the .zip file

3. run the .exe file in the folder

How to play:

- See the 2 "Guide" screenshots (screenshot 3 & screenshot 4)

Credits:

1. Palette - famicube - by Arne Niklas Jansson

2. Font - m3x6 - by Daniel Linssen
